sourcesContent:
Order Date Total Status
# {{order.id}} {{order.orderDate | date: 'medium'}} {{order.total | currency}} {{order.status}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Order } from '../shared/models/order'; import { OrdersService } from './orders.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-orders', templateUrl: './orders.component.html', styleUrls: ['./orders.component.scss'] }) export class OrdersComponent implements OnInit { orders: Order[] = []; constructor(private orderService: OrdersService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getOrders(); } getOrders() { this.orderService.getOrdersForUser().subscribe({ next: orders => this.orders = orders }) } }
